meanings.definition: Greatest in amount, quantity, or degree.
meanings.sent1: She is the most talented singer in the group.
meanings.sent2: The tallest building in the city is the most impressive.
meanings.sent3: The most colorful bird in the forest caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: His most prized possession was a small, worn-out teddy bear.
meanings.sent5: The most delicious cake I've ever tasted melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: The most of the students preferred pizza for lunch.
meanings.sent2: She ate the most of the cookies at the party.
meanings.sent3: The most of the toys were scattered around the room.
meanings.sent4: He had the most of the marbles in his collection.
meanings.sent5: The most of the day was spent playing in the park.

meanings.sent1: She most enjoys reading mystery novels in her free time.
meanings.sent2: They most appreciate the help they received during the project.
meanings.sent3: He most dances when he thinks no one is watching.
meanings.sent4: The flowers most bloom in the spring season.
meanings.sent5: I most cherish the memories of our family vacation.
